channel.title: dp on Headstone lamp - leetcode grind (48)

item.title: 121. Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
item.description: # O(n) time || O(1) space def max_profit(self, prices: List[int]) -> int: min_price, res = prices[0], 0 for price in prices[1:]: if price < min_price: min_price = price else: res = max(res, price - min_price) return res The idea is to find the maximum difference between two numbers in the array where the smaller number comes before the larger number. This difference represents the maximum profit.
